title: Independent
data: Developed on its own, and development doesn’t depend on any other linux os

title: Lightening fast
data: A Highly optimized and light weight collections of alog’s for the smooth and fast workflow

title: Highly Customizable
data: Creativity is the only limit, you can customize each and every thing you use and you can

title: A Better Hierarchy
data: Your apps are going to install on a seperate hierarch /apps, so that you can manage your apps, and system with stability

title: Bundle Kits
data: Their is a bundle of apps and kits to suit your workflow, so that you need not to setup everything and integerate them

title: Surprise
